title: Reacting to Redfall’s New Story Trailer w/ Andrea Rene - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.16.23
description:
Go to http://joinhoney.com/kindafunny to get PayPal Honey for free.

Blessing is joined by Andrea and they discuss that new Redfall trailer, Fortnite's new creative mode, and a new studio from former Criterion devs.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:05:56 - Housekeeping
A new Kinda Funny Xcast is up about MLB The Show. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
Kinda Funny Games Showcase returns next Monday as a 7 hour stream featuring 14 games! Come hang out all day on Twitch and Youtube starting at 10am PT.
For weeks now Andy has carried Mike and Nick through the Lands Between in their seamless co-op Elden Ring play through. Join them this Friday as Andy puts his sanity and possibly his health on the line as they try to play all day long with your help during their Elden Ring mini marathon stream!
The Roper Report   -
00:08:25 - Redfall gets a new trailer!
00:16:28 - Former Criterion leads have formed a new studio
00:24:13 - Ads
00:25:18 - Fortnite's Unreal Engine 5 Editor Arrives Next Week
00:37:21 - FIFA’s president says its EA Sports FC rival will be ‘the best e-game for any girl or boy’
00:47:13 - BAFTA’s recognizing Shuhei Yoshida!
00:49:03 - March's Nintendo Switch Online Games 
00:50:05 - Out today
00:51:14 - You‘re Wrong
